fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, you may Douse a player in gasoline.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will Douse anyone that visits you.
- If you take no action, you will attempt to clean gasoline off of yourself (if you are not roleblocked).
- Targeting yourself will ignite all Doused players instead, dealing an unstoppable attack.
- Players will not know they're Doused unless they are an Arsonist 4877.
- You know who is Doused.
